name: api_scene_Scene
description: The runtime data structure for a scene.

properties.name: buildIndex
properties.description: Return the index of the Scene in the Build Settings.

properties.name: handle
properties.description: A unique identifier for a loaded scene.

properties.name: isDirty
properties.description: Returns true if the Scene is modified.

properties.name: isLoaded
properties.description: IsLoaded is set to true after loading has completed and objects have been enabled.

properties.name: isSubScene
properties.description: Whether this scene is a subscene.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Returns the name of the Scene that is currently active in the game or app.

properties.name: path
properties.description: Returns the relative path of the Scene. For example: "Assets/MyScenes/MyScene.unity".

properties.name: rootCount
properties.description: The number of root transforms of this Scene.

properties.name: GetRootGameObjects
properties.description: Returns all the root game objects in the Scene.

properties.name: IsValid
properties.description: Whether this is a valid Scene. A Scene may be invalid if, for example, you tried to open a Scene tha
